TopicTitle: Gourmand mission will not complete if surface samples are returned before you get contract. [Even after trying to complete it again]

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.1 (latest) | Mods: K2-D2, Micro Engineer, Maeuver Node Controller, Node Manager, orbital survey. | Can replicate without mods? No 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: AMD Rysen 9 5950X | GPU: 3070ti | RAM: 64GB

 

Went to Moho early as I had an launch window, this arrived before I reached Duna. Did land at the croissant and orge rock and did highland and lowland biomes. 
Also landed an probe at the moheart as I know it would come up later. 
Had also explored Gilly and landed probes at Eve. 
Returned to Kerbin. 
Then reached Duna and the monument. 
Cash in from orbit of Eve, the Gilly crater and the moheart but not Gourmand even if surface samples was returned.

I did land and got surface samples again from the croissant doing radiation science and returned this again but it did not help.

I think the Gourmand mission should be before moheart as its an easier one. For moheart you are landing on an very uneven surface in the bottom of an hole and terrain is bugged so larger landing legs and wheels make you bounce around. 

-----
Not an bug you can easy replicate without mods without replaying the story but is also very unlikely to be mod related.
